heroblade.release_notes:
Release v3.0.1.34715 (LTS)


- Granny was upgraded from version 2.9.7 to 2.11.8.0 (pre-release)


- Real-time version checking was added to the Analysis > Statistics function (Granny, PhysX, DirectX, etc.).


- The crash that occurred when the editor was left open for a long time has been fixed.


- The large number of DLLs and files has been reduced.


- The version control system has been improved.
